nodes.text: The Anarrian Empire was a dictatorship of the Near-Human Anarrian species that ruled over much of the western continent of the planet Altiria/Anarris, in the Unknown Regions. Formed around the time of the Mandalorian Wars and most of Altiria/Anarris'. The empire sought to gain dominance over the Altiri, a rival species of the Anarrians.
